actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-822.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5723) to authorize appropriations for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5723 (Department of Transportation maritime programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5723) to authorize appropriations for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
